item.title: [pi]edit new question:how do i make yell prem[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

I’m guessing you know how to make commands right?

If so, use a simple if statement to check if prem == 1. Place the if statement inside of your command.

if(prem == 1) {
    /* Do whatever here, this will only work if prem is 1 not higher, not lower. */
}
